name: WinRateByOwner
functionalRequirements:
## Win Rate By Owner

### Purpose
Visualize win rates by deal owner/sales rep.

### Features
- Bar chart visualization
- Owner performance comparison
- Win/loss ratios
- Sortable by metrics

dataRequirements.description: Visualizes win rates by deal owner

entities.name: Deals
entities.description: Deal records for owner performance analysis

technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- ownerData: Array of owner performance metrics
- sortBy: Sort field
- onOwnerClick: Owner selection handler

properties.name: ownerData
properties.type: Array<{ownerId: string, ownerName: string, wins: number, losses: number, winRate: number, totalDeals: number}>
